amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds to be used to finalize the rule entitled Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Automatic Commercial Ice Makers.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
